participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is resilient and determined, often using humor to cope with challenges. He values family and has a strong work ethic.
participant_1.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is outgoing and friendly, with a passion for sports and a love for music. She enjoys connecting with others and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister.
